results.reason_for_recall: An investigation identified that the products were possibly manufactured from a different material than defined in the applicable specifications.
results.code_info: All items marked with "Normed" are affected
results.distribution_pattern: The products were distributed to the following US states:  AL, AR, AZ, CA, CO, FL, GA, HI, IA, IL, IN, KS, KY, LA, MA, MD, ME, MI, MN, MO, MT, NC, ND, NE, NH, NJ, NM, NV, NY, OH, OK, OR, PA, SC, TN, TX, UT, VA, WA, WI, WV, and WY.
